mods.name: Independent Z-Motor Mod
mods.author: **SpiteDriven**
mods.summary: This mod allows users to use independent Nema 17 stepper motors to control Z-movement, and therefore allows for Z-tilt like a Voron Trident.

mods.name: Mini 12864 Mounting bracket
mods.author: https://github.com/rowokii
mods.summary: A simple mounting bracket for mounting a [MINI 12864 LCD Display Housing for 2020 V-slot](https://www.printables.com/model/56150-mini-12864-lcd-display-housing-for-2020-v-slot) to the Magpie bottom front connector block.  M3x35 bolts are replaced with longer (M3x40 or 45) to bolt the bracket as shown.

mods.name: Magpie Toolhead – Sherpa Mini V2 Compatible Mod (Revision 1 Only)
mods.author: **SpiteDriven**
mods.summary: This mod is **only compatible with the Revision 1** version of the Magpie toolhead. As of **11/5/25**, Revision 1 is still the current version, so this information is up to date.

mods.name: X/Y Endstop Switches
mods.author: https://github.com/rowokii
mods.summary: Default for Magpie is to use sensorless homing.  Since my controller board had the older step drivers that does not support sensorless homing, I added limit switches for X/Y endstops.  Any micro switches that has mounting holes 6.5mm apart should work fine.

mods.name: Z Axis - Lead Screw Mod
mods.author: https://github.com/rowokii
mods.summary: Magpie BOM calls for NEMA 17 stepper motor with a 400mm lead screw integrated into it.
